metadata.title: Azure AI Engineer AI-102 Practice Questions

1.name: Plan and Manage an Azure AI Solution

5.name: Implement Knowledge Mining and Document Intelligence

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Plan and Manage an Azure AI Solution (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Managed Identities is a key concept in Plan and Manage an Azure AI Solution. This domain covers topics essential for the Azure AI Engineer exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with plan, create, and deploy an azure ai service. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any plan and manage an azure ai solution task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Plan and Manage an Azure AI Solution is most closely related to manage azure ai services?
options: Plan and Manage an Azure AI Solution governance and oversight
Plan and Manage an Azure AI Solution implementation and operations
Plan and Manage an Azure AI Solution assessment and testing
Plan and Manage an Azure AI Solution risk management
questions.explanation: Manage Azure AI services falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Plan and Manage an Azure AI Solution.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Plan and Manage an Azure AI Solution (Domain 1)?
